short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple CT To-Do List extension to put your daily tasks and then mark them completed if they are completed at the end of the day.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple CT To-Do List extension to put your daily tasks and then mark them completed if they are completed at the end of the day.
